Text: Thanks for the torrent, good quality video and audio!
This torrent is with russian sound and dialogues.
How do i put it in English please dude ?
Well I was going to download this one but with 2 or 3 comments saying it's not in English, I've decided not to.

It very clearly says 

         Audio First....: Russian
         Audio Second...: English
in the description. In VLC player right click on the video, select audio, audio track and track 2 for English.
